snippet.title: The List: Guy Fieri's NFL-inspired menu items
snippet.description:
The List: Guy Fieri's NFL-inspired menu items by Bill Hanstock on Nov 15 2012, 1:34p
World-famous chef Guy Fieri is drawing ire for his new Times Square restaurant. Wait 'til you see his new NFL-inspired dishes; they'll knock your socks off!

snippet.title: Super Bowl Recipes: A Guide To The Perfect Game Day Menu
snippet.description:
Super Bowl Recipes: A Guide To The Perfect Game Day Menu by Jon Bois on Feb 3 2012, 12:08p
This Super Bowl recipe guide comes courtesy of Sarah Sprague. Check out her website, sarahsprague.com, and follow her on Twitter at @sarah_sprague. Super Bowl party snacks can be divided into...
